This is running on freebsd. The error occurs when I try to view the report via the run command using the browser. If the report doenst contain the chart, it shows up fine. 

Someone on IRC mentioned that it is a conversion problem. All numbers are rounded using round() in the mysql query.
I have to add that the report shows perfectly in preview as html or pdf in the designer.

What version are you using, did you try with RC2?

When you say the run command in the browser, is it the browser you launch from 
eclipse (or the url from the browser launched inside eclipse). Is it your own 
web server?
We are running the latest stable version. Its a url within a regular browser. We have tried it with the latest release, and even the nightly build.
Could you confirm your birt version? Actually the ChartReportItemQueryImpl is no longer used since build N20060429.

We didnt copy the charting and reporting engine along with the newest birt.
Sorry. Good catch with that last comment.
